message:
Fact #21 Current estimates of the number of American children who are trafficked is 300,000 per year, yet there are only about 300 treatment beds in the U.S. in facilities with the level of care required to adequately treat these victims.  What about the others?
30 Facts ~ National Slavery and Human Trafficking Prevention Month 
#HelpERASE #ChildTrafficking #ProtectOurKids
